overview: Every gay young man should have a friend they can call whenever to chill and hang out with while still banging one another's brains out, also known as a fuck buddy. Dennis and Tyler took their friendship to fuck buddy level while enjoying some alone time on Dennis's couch, sucking and fucking after practice. Grayson and Declan have been fuck buddies for years, and after a swim in the pool, Declan takes another ride on Grayson's big cock before getting his load. Sammy doesn't feel bad about using his power as team captain to choose his fuck buddies. And up next is Josh, who doesn't mind at all. He's been wanting Sammy's cock all season and knows what to do with it. Bentley isn't into fucking, but that doesn't stop him and Xavier from being Fuck buddies, especially when Xavier loves getting handjobs from him. Tommy's fuck buddy isn't around, but that doesn't stop him from taking matters into his own hand. Enjoy all of this hot action on Me and My Fuck Buddy.
title: Me and My Fuck Buddy
